_sText:
Are you ready?
Ready to escape from an jail?
You run trough the cell blocks, to the pool, over the office into the freedome...
But...
will you reach that?
or did you die at
the pump-system?
falling into a "black hole"?
the automatic find-and-destroy camera?
Try it... and punish the prison guard...
Smell the air... of freedome...

------------------------------------

Deathrun_Jail_Escape_V1_fixA

13.03.2010

It's a map that I created over month for a community.

project-mp.com


This is the fix of V1. Inofficial named v1.3, too.

Changelog:

Changed Textures around the pool
changed water texture
setting up some traps
insert an automatical config changer at roundstart
insert a event sayer
make a ramp at the end
some other textures are changed
the shaft is gonna fixed (at sv_wateraccelerate < ~300 you can't go to the next)
changed brightness of light at the pool and in the shaft


So I wish you much fun.

Do not modify or change anything at the archive, map, files, readme or something else.

First ask me:

FOR E-MAIL TAKE A LOOK IN THE README (in the zip)

greetz

PytonBitch aka HANKY der Weihnachtskot
